robot

Class Syst

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Syst

  • public final class Syst
extends java.lang.Object
    Assembly functions - class Syst
    Implements the commands MOVE, DRAG, DROP, HIT, LOOK and get from the World if it has permission for executing the correspondent action.
    Author:
    Karina Suemi, Renato Cordeiro, Vin√≠cius Silva
    See Also:
    Ctrl, World
